import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'mipaginaweb'; public searchInput: string; public programmingLanguages = [ 'Python','TypeScript','C','C++','Java', 'Go','JavaScript','PHP','Ruby','Swift','Kotlin' ] }
